name: Share_it - Open Access Publications and Research Data Repository
description: Share_it is the central service for storing, archiving and making accessible publications (eg Open Access publications, secondary publications, grey literature) and research data for the University Libraries in Saxony-Anhalt and Martin Luther University Halle-Wittenberg.
owner_name: Martin Luther University Halle-Wittenberg / University Libraries in Saxony-Anhalt
